section.title: Change Layout for a Specific Topic.
section.p: If you need to have a different column layout just for one topic, you can use the following technique:

ol.li: Define an outputclass on the topic root element.<topic outputclass="two_columns" ...

section.p: Note that the topic will be separated from other sibling topics with different page layouts by page breaks.

section.title: Change Column Breaks for Headings
section.p: If you need to start each topic on a new column, you can use the following technique:

Let's say you have the following map:<map> <title>Map</title> <topicref href="first.dita"> <topicref href="second.dita"/> </topicref> <topichead navtitle="Topichead"> <topicref href="second.dita"/> </topichead> </map>
Each topic will be displayed on a new column except topics having only a title and no content.
